entries: If the graywarper takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced

trait.name: to 0
entries: If the graywarper takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Psionic Nexus
entries: When a non-minion voiceless talker within 30 feet of the graywarper uses telepathy or manifests a psionic power, they can do so as if they were in the graywarper's space.

action.name: Phase Chant (Group Attack)
entries: {@i Melee or Ranged Power Attack:} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}4 psychic damage. If the target is a creature and if three or more graywarpers joined the attack, the target must make a Charisma saving throw. The DC for this saving throw is 11 plus the number of graywarpers who joined the attack. On a failed save, the target becomes phased until the end of their next turn. While phased, the creature is translucent and immaterial, and they deal half damage with weapon attacks and unarmed strikes.

trait.name: Psionic Immunity
entries: The hulking brain is unaffected by psionic powers manifested by voiceless talkers unless the brain wishes to be.

trait.name: Psychic Scream
entries: When the brain drops to 0 hit points, each creature within 30 feet of them must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brain makes three Bash attacks.

action.name: Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and has disadvantage on saving throws against psionic powers. The brain can grapple up to four creatures at once.

action.name: Squeeze
entries: Each creature {@condition grappled} by the brain must make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Psionic Invigoration (1/Day)
entries: Each willing voiceless talker within 60 feet of the brain regains the use of one psionic power of the voiceless talker's choice, and the voiceless talker has advantage on attack rolls until the end of the brain's next turn.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The mindkiller can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Psionic Immunity
entries: The mindkiller is unaffected by psionic powers manifested by voiceless talkers unless the mindkiller wishes to be.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).

action.name: Concealing Strike
entries: {@i Ranged Power Attack:} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) psychic damage, and the mindkiller is {@condition invisible} to the target until the end of the mindkiller's next turn.

action.name: Mindwipe
entries: A Humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mindkiller must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or the mindkiller enters the Humanoid's body. While inside a Humanoid, the mindkiller has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside the Humanoid, and the only action the mindkiller can take is to leave the body, exiting in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body.

When a Humanoid ends their turn with the mindkiller inside of them, they must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 10 necrotic damage. If the Humanoid is reduced to 0 hit points, they die and the mindkiller takes over the body, which regains hit points equal to the Humanoid's hit point maximum. The mindkiller retains their Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, their understanding of Deep Speech and Undercommon, and their telepathy. They otherwise adopt the target's statistics and can take the actions the creature could take. They know everything the creature knew, including spells, class features, traits, and languages. If the body is reduced to 0 hit points after the mindkiller takes control, the mindkiller must leave it.

A creature wielding a sharp tool or weapon within reach of a Humanoid host or body with a mindkiller inside can use an action to attempt to remove the mindkiller, making an attack roll against the Humanoid's AC if the host is unwilling. On a hit, the creature deals 11 ({@damage 2d10}) slashing damage to the host and must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom (Medicine) check. On a successful check, the creature cuts the mindkiller out of the host. On a faiIed check, if this slashing damage reduced the host to 0 hit points, the mindkiller kills the host; otherwise, there is no effect.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The whelp can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the whelp takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the whelp takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Psionic Immunity
entries: The whelp is unaffected by psionic powers manifested by voiceless talkers unless the whelp wishes to be.

trait.name: Resistance Drain
entries: When an enemy within 5 feet of three or more whelps makes a saving throw against a power or psionic effect, the enemy takes a penalty to the save equal to the number of whelps within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Claws (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 slashing damage.

monster.name: Lord Syuul

trait.name: Draw In
entries: If Lord Syuul fails a saving throw while grappling at least one enemy, he can choose to release all {@condition grappled} creatures and succeed on the saving throw instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lord Syuul makes two Tentacle or two Psionic Repeater attacks then manifests a power or uses Memory Transfer.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) psychic damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}).

action.name: Psionic Repeater
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) force damage.

action.name: Brain Overload (1/Day; 6th-Order Power)
entries: Lord Syuul creates a sudden surge of energy in the mind of a creature he can see within 120 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 14d10}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target has a brain and is reduced to 0 hit points, their brain explodes, and if they can't survive without their brain, they die.

action.name: Flay (6th-Order Power)
entries: Lord Syuul shoots a 15-foot cone of psionic energy from his eyes. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Intelligence saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Memory Transfer
entries: Lord Syuul psionically plunders the mind of each creature he is grappling. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Intelligence saving throw or take 44 ({@damage 8d10}) psychic damage. If a target fails their saving throw and doesn't escape the grapple by the end of their next turn, they must choose one of these effects:

items: The target's proficiency bonus drops to 0, they can't form new thoughts or speak, and they have disadvantage on all ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. Only the {@i cure ailment} power, a {@spell lesser restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect can end this effect. Additionally, until Lord Syuul finishes a long rest, he gains a cumulative +5 bonus to damage rolls.

The target is {@condition charmed} by Lord Syuul for 1 hour. While the target is {@condition charmed}, Lord Syuul can issue the target telepathic commands (no action required), which the target does their best to obey. Each time the target takes damage, they can make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Guise (3rd-Order Power)
entries: Lord Syuul projects a psionic image over his body, transforming his appearance for 1 hour into that of a Medium creature he has seen. When he manifests this power, he can also change the appearance of any equipment he carries.

The changes wrought by this power fail to hold up to physical inspection. A creature can use an action to inspect Lord Syuul's appearance and make a {@dc 19} Intelligence (Investigation) check, noticing the image is a projection on a success.

bonus.name: Grappling Jaunt
entries: Lord Syuul and each creature {@condition grappled} by him teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

reaction.name: Brain Drain
entries: When a creature {@condition grappled} by Lord Syuul makes a saving throw against Memory Transfer, Lord Syuul momentarily weakens the creature and the creature has disadvantage on the saving throw.

legendaryHeader: Lord Syuul has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Mindblind
entries: Each enemy Lord Syuul can see within 60 feet of him must make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature can't see creatures other than Lord Syuul for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Was I Ever Here?
entries: Lord Syuul becomes {@condition invisible}, teleports 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see, and can take the Hide action. At the same time, an illusory psionic image of Lord Syuul appears in the space he left, gesturing, speaking, and behaving as he chooses (no action required). A creature who touches the image for the first time on a turn or makes a melee attack against it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage because things can pass through it. Lord Syuul's invisibility ends and his image disappears at the end of his next turn.

legendary.name: Action 3: Mindshatter
entries: Each enemy Lord Syuul can see within 60 feet of him must make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage and is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Psionic Pistol)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3 plus PB}, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 plus PB} force damage. Beginning at 7th level, the operative can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Phasing Charge (3/Day)
entries: When the operative hits a creature with a signature attack, they can attempt to teleport the target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be teleported up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space on the ground that the operative can see.

action.name: 5th Level: Telekinetic Repulsion (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the operative releases a powerful pulse of energy. Each enemy within 10 feet of the operative must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd6} force damage and is pushed up to 10 feet directly away from the operative. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

action.name: 7th Level: Memory Thief (3/Day; 4th-Order Power; Concentration)
entries: The operative psionically plunders the mind of a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, and for 1 minute, the target's proficiency bonus is cumulatively lowered by 1 and the infiltrator gains a cumulative +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls and to each feature's save DC. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and doesn't have their proficiency bonus reduced.
A creature whose proficiency bonus drops to 0 can't form new thoughts or speak, and they have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws.

trait.name: Stubborn Rage
entries: The wyvern is immune to the {@condition frightened} and {@condition stunned} conditions while they have fewer than half their hit points or are within 60 feet of another wyvern they can hear or see.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wyvern makes one Stinger attack and one Bite attack. They can replace one attack with a use of Tail Sweep.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). A {@i cure ailment} power or a {@spell lesser restoration} spell ends this effect on a target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d12 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the wyvern can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail Sweep
entries: The wyvern swipes their tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away from the wyvern.

bonus.name: Seek
entries: The wyvern takes the Search action.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Learning to Fly
entries: The wyvern has a flying speed of 10 × PB feet.

action.name: Signature Attack (Stinger)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB}, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Acidic Sting (2 Ferocity)
entries: The wyvern makes a signature attack with a reach of 15 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} acid damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Liquefied Meal (5 Ferocity)
entries: The wyvern pounces on a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of them, attempting to melt their prey's flesh with acid and drink it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and take {@damage 1d4 plus PB} acid damage. The wyvern gains temporary hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

action.name: 5th Level: Tail Sweep (8 Ferocity)
entries: The wyvern sweeps their tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or take {@damage PBd6} bludgeoning damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away from the wyvern.

reaction.name: Enraged Protector
entries: When a creature the wyvern can see within 30 feet of them reduces the wyvern's caregiver to 0 hit points or scores a critical hit against the caregiver, the wyvern can move up to their speed. If the wyvern ends this movement within 5 feet of the attacker, the wyvern can make a signature attack against them.

condition.name: dazed|fleemortals
entries: A {@b dazed} creature can only do one of the following things on their turn: move, use an action, or use a bonus action. If a creature becomes dazed during their turn, their turn ends. The {@i cure ailment} power, {@spell lesser restoration} spell, and {@spell greater restoration} spell remove the dazed condition. At the GM's discretion, other powers, spells, or effects might also remove the dazed condition.

When a dazed creature is affected by a spell or effect that gives them an extra action on their turn (like the {@spell haste} spell or the fighter's Action Surge feature), they can still take this extra action, in addition to the movement, action, or bonus action allowed by the dazed condition.

Some creatures in this book have immunity to the dazed condition. At the GM's discretion, a creature published in the core rules or another supplement who has immunity to the paralyzed or stunned condition also has immunity to the dazed condition.

condition.name: Flanked
entries: If your game uses the optional flanking rules in the core rules, a creature who is immune to the {@b flanked} condition can't be flanked regardless of the position of their enemies.

sense.name: Soulsight
entries: Demons have a special sense called soulsight, allowing them to perceive each creature, other than Constructs and Undead, within a certain radius. Soulsight doesn't rely on sight but counts as "seeing" for features that require sight. Neither physical objects (including total cover) nor supernatural effects can impede soulsight unless otherwise stated. A demon's stat block lists the radius of their soulsight under "Senses."

optionalfeature.name: Control Projectiles
entries: {@i 2nd-Order Telekinesis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 reaction, which you take when a creature you can see within 60 feet of you makes a ranged weapon attack
{@b Range:} 60 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous
You telekinetically affect the projectile's flight. The attack roll is made with advantage or disadvantage (your choice).

optionalfeature.name: Deserved Transfer
entries: {@i 2nd-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous

You fire a bolt of draining psychic energy at a creature within range. Make a ranged power attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} psychic damage, and the psychic energy bounces to another creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The second creature gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by {@damage 2d8}.

optionalfeature.name: Dream Spores
entries: {@i 5th-Order Telepathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 1 minute

You release a burst of psionic spores. Each creature you can see within 30 feet of you must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by you for the duration. While charmed in this way, a creature must use their movement during their turn to move within 10 feet of you by the safest available route.
A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw whenever they take damage, ending the effect on themself on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Energy Eyes
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Resopathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 120 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous

You beam elemental energy from your eyes at a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 5d10} damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Choose the damage type from the following list: cold, fire, lightning, or radiant.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by {@damage 2d10}.

optionalfeature.name: Invigorated March
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 bonus action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous

You emit a burst of mentally invigorating energy into the mind of a creature you can see within range. That creature can use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, you target one additional creature.

optionalfeature.name: Liquefy
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 reaction
{@b Range:} 5 feet
{@b Duration:} 1 round

You psionically barrage your attacker with transformative energy. The attacker must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away from you and restrained until the end of their next turn, as their lower body temporarily melts into an immovable goo.

optionalfeature.name: Memory Thief
entries: {@i 4th-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 1 minute

You plunder the mind of a creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 4d10} psychic damage, their proficiency bonus is lowered by 1, and you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and your power save DC for the duration.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by {@damage 2d10}.

optionalfeature.name: Mental Lance
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Telepathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 60 feet
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 1 minute

You mentally assail a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 4d10} psychic damage and is {@condition frightened} of you for the duration (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't frightened.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by {@damage 2d10}.

optionalfeature.name: Mind Scream
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Telepathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous

You psionically pierce the mind of each enemy you can see within range. Each target must make an Intelligence saving throw, taking {@damage 5d6} psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is automatically stabilized.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by {@damage 2d6}.

optionalfeature.name: Mind Splinter
entries: {@i 1st-Order Telepathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 60 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous

You attempt to erase your image from the mind of a creature within range. Make a ranged power attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage, and you become {@condition invisible} to them until the start of your next turn.
This power's damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Phase
entries: {@i 4th-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} Self
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 1 minute

You imbue your body and everything you wear and carry with psychic energy, allowing it to pass through solid objects. For the duration, you can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. You take {@damage 1d10} force damage if you end your turn inside an object. If this power ends while you are inside a creature or object, you are shunted out of it into the closest unoccupied space of your choice.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, you target one additional creature within 5 feet of you.

optionalfeature.name: Piscine Transformation
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 10 minutes

You target a Humanoid you can see within range with a pulse of transformational energy. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or undergo one of the following transformations of your choice for the duration. The target can choose to fail this saving throw.

items: {@b Head.} The target's head transforms into the head of a fish, proportionately sized for their body. They can't speak.
{@b Legs.} The target's legs become fins. Their walking speed is reduced to 10 feet (unless their walking speed is slower), and they gain a swimming speed of 30 feet.

{@b Torso.} The target's torso becomes the body of a fish with gills. They can only breathe water and can hold their breath for 1 hour. If the target isn't underwater when this transformation takes effect, they begin suffocating.

entries: {@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 2 to target any creature, instead of just a Humanoid, if they have the necessary body part you wish to transform.
Additionally, you can increase this power's order by 2 to increase its duration to 1 hour.

optionalfeature.name: Shockwave
entries: {@i 2nd-Order Telekinesis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 bonus action
{@b Range:} Self
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous
You unleash a psionic shock wave. Each creature within 10 feet of you must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet directly away from you.

optionalfeature.name: Sickening Sympathy
entries: {@i 2nd-Order Telekinesis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 reaction, which you take when another creature you can see within 30 feet of you is hit with an attack
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} 1 round
The creature who made the triggering attack must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@damage poisoned} until the end of their next turn as they feel the nauseous pain of their target.

optionalfeature.name: Vanish for One
entries: {@i 2nd-Order Resopathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 60 feet
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 1 minute

You obscure yourself in the sight of a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or you become {@damage invisible} to them for the duration (save ends at end of turn). This effect ends early if you attack the creature, deal damage to them, or create an effect that forces them to make a saving throw.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to make its manifestation time 1 bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Adept Climber
entries: The bear has a climbing speed of 25 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Arctic Traveler
entries: The bear has advantage on saving throws to avoid gaining exhaustion, can tolerate temperatures as cold as −50° Fahrenheit, and ignores difficult terrain created by ice or snow.

optionalfeature.name: Bonus Action: Fearsome Growl (1/Day)
entries: The bear lets out a mighty growl. Each creature within 15 feet of the bear who can hear them must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the bear until the end of the bear's next turn. A creature who succeeds on their saving throw is immune to the Fearsome Growl of all bears for 24 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Clever Claws
entries: The bear can use their long claws in place of thieves' tools to open locks, and they gain a +3 bonus to Dexterity checks made to do so.

optionalfeature.name: Powerful Jaws
entries: The bear's Bite attack deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage, and it deals maximum damage to Plants. (A bear with this feature can't take the Multiattack action.)

optionalfeature.name: Sprint (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

prerequisite.other: Black bear, brown bear (grizzly bear), polar bear, spectacled bear, or sun bear

entries: When the bear moves on their turn in combat, they can triple their speed until the end of their turn.

optionalfeature.name: Action: Crushing Grip
entries: The bird's powerful talons crush a creature they are grappling or attached to. The target must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

optionalfeature.name: Aerial Pursuit (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the bird starts their turn in the air, they can triple their flying speed until the end of their turn. If they descend at least 30 feet on that turn, they have advantage on the next attack they make before the end of their turn. (Replaces the High-Speed Dive trait.)

optionalfeature.name: Agile Flyer
entries: While in the air, the bird has a +5 bonus to Dexterity saving throws and Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks.

optionalfeature.name: Decapitating Strike
entries: When the bird scores a critical hit against a Tiny target, the target is decapitated. A decapitated target dies if they can't survive without that head.

optionalfeature.name: Glide
entries: The bird can take a short rest while flying horizontally.

optionalfeature.name: Night Hunter
entries: The bird has darkvision out to a range of 120 feet and has a +5 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

optionalfeature.name: Ocean Hunter
entries: When the bird starts their turn above water, they don't have disadvantage on attacks due to being underwater until the end of their turn.

optionalfeature.name: Powerful Impact
entries: If the bird descends at least 20 feet on their turn immediately before hitting with a Rending Talons attack or Talons attack, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage. (+1 CR)

optionalfeature.name: Scavenger's Resilience
entries: The bird has advantage on Constitution saving throws and resistance to poison damage.

optionalfeature.name: Wind Hover
entries: The bird can hover while flying.

optionalfeature.name: Action: Deafening Song (Recharge 6)
entries: The swarm produces an earsplitting buzz. Each creature within 15 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be deafened (save ends at end of turn).

optionalfeature.name: Action: Multiattack
entries: The swarm makes two Bite attacks. (+1 CR)

optionalfeature.name: Burrower
entries: The swarm has a burrowing speed of 5 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Darkvision

prerequisite.other: Beetles, mosquitoes, cockroaches, or any nocturnal insect

entries: The swarm has darkvision out to a range of 30 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Disease Carrier
entries: When the swarm hits a creature with an attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} (save ends at end of turn).

optionalfeature.name: Durable
entries: The swarm's hit points are doubled, and they have an Armor Class of 15, a +5 bonus to Constitution saving throws, and advantage on Constitution saving throws. (+1 CR)

optionalfeature.name: Flyer

prerequisite.other: Cicadas, locusts, wasps, or any flying insect

entries: The swarm has a flying speed of 30 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Sting

prerequisite.other: Fire ants, bullet ants, or wasps

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, or 1 piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage if the swarm has half their hit points or fewer. (Replaces the Bite attack)

optionalfeature.name: Adept Climber

prerequisite.other: Clouded leopard, jaguar, leopard, lynx, or snow leopard

entries: The wildcat has a climbing speed of 25 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Agile Landing
entries: The wildcat takes no damage from falling 40 feet or less, provided they aren't {@condition incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Deadly Bite
entries: When the wildcat hits a {@condition prone} creature with a Bite attack, the attack is a critical hit.

optionalfeature.name: Desert Dweller
entries: The wildcat ignores difficult terrain created by dirt and sand. They can tolerate temperatures as high as 120° Fahrenheit, and they don't need to drink water as long as they have fresh food.

optionalfeature.name: Mountain Dweller
entries: The wildcat ignores difficult terrain created by snow, ice, or steep slopes.

optionalfeature.name: Superior Sprint (2/Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the wildcat moves on their turn in combat, they can quadruple their speed until the end of their turn. (Replaces the Sprint trait.)

optionalfeature.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The wildcat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wildcat's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't {@creature incapacitated}.

optionalfeature.name: Powerful Leap

prerequisite.other: Caracal, cougar, lion, margay, serval, or snow leopard

entries: The wildcat has a climbing speed of 25 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Swimmer
entries: The wildcat has a swimming speed of 30 feet.
